item.title: Resume
item.description: Last update : 27/07/23 Yanis TALEB, 22 years old. I am a Network & Telecommunication engineering student 📡 at UTT. Here is my updated resume. If needed, you can contact me via : LinkedIn talebyanis@laposte.net Work Experience 👨🏻‍💼 & Education 👨🏻‍🎓 2019 👶🏻 Scientific Baccalaureate at Lycée Henri Poincaré, Nancy 2020 🦠 Google Machine Learning Certificate Completion certificate of the Machine Learning course at intermediate level organized by Google. 2021 🦠 PEH (Practical Ethical Hacker) INE PTS (Penetration Testing Student) DUT Informatique Graduated at IUT Nancy-Charlemagne INRIA Nancy Grand-Est (Internship) 3 months internship in which I implemented a debugging tool for FPGA with an integration for the Silice Language.
